name: Air Fryer Salmon Burgers
author: Yoly
summary: Salmon burgers served with fixings of your choice like tomatoes, onion, lettuce, or pickles. Cooked in the air fryer for a greaseless and oil-free salmon patty.
ingredients: 1 (14.75 ounce) can salmon, drained and flaked
1 teaspoon seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®)
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
3 large roll or bun (3-1/2" dia)s brioche buns, halved
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line the air fryer basket with parchment paper and spray with avocado oil
Mix salmon, panko, onion, 1/3 cup mayonnaise, lemon juice, egg, dill, seafood seasoning, salt, and pepper in a bow until well combined
Place salmon patties into the basket and spray with avocado oil
Air fry until patties are golden brown, 8 to 10 minutes
Flip patties over, spray with avocado oil, and air fry an additional 4 to 7 minutes
Serve on buns spread with remaining mayonnaise
